borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2024/00326/FUL granted 31st May 2024 for the 'Erection of rear extensions at ground, first and second floor level following the demolition of existing conservatory extension at ground floor level; erection of a single storey rear extension to the rear and side of the extended back addition; formation of a roof terrace at first floor level to the rear elevation; replacement of 2no rooflights with dormer windows in the front roofslope and 1no rooflight with a dormer window in the rear roofslope; installation of 1no rooflight above the main flat roof at roof level' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include alterations to the roof of ground floor rear extension to include installation of additional rooflights and change the pitched roof into a flat roof, alterations to the design and increasing the size of rear bi-folding doors at ground floor level, and removal of chimney at roof level.
